Scene:
The Visit of Wada Byoe
(Wada Byōe jōshi / 和田兵衛上使)

Play: The Battle of Sakamoto Castle (近江源氏先陣館)

Production: September 1987



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Sakitayū (豊竹咲大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Seisuke (鶴澤清介)
